title: Surveys
detail: This task group includes examples of surveys that are currently supported by the ResearchSuiteUI framework.

tasks.title: List UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `list` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `list` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchSuiteUI framework.

tasks.title: Picker UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `picker` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `picker` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchSuiteUI framework.

tasks.title: Textfield UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `textfield` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `textfield` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchSuiteUI framework.

title: Recorders
detail: This task group includes examples of active tasks that include spoken instructions and recorders that are currently included in the ResearchSuite and ResearchSuiteUI frameworks.

tasks.title: Distance Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording relative GPS location.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording GPS distance data using the RSDDistanceRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

tasks.title: Motion Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording motion sensor data.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording motion sensor data using the RSDMotionRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

title: Image/Video
detail: This task group includes examples of image and video steps that are currently included in the ResearchSuite and ResearchSuiteUI frameworks.

tasks.title: Image Picker
tasks.subtitle: Activity for selecting images.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for selecting images either from your photo library or using the camera.

title: Data Tracking
detail: This task group includes examples of tasks that track data.

tasks.title: Medication Tracking
tasks.subtitle: Task for recording your medication
tasks.detail: This is an example of setting up a medication schedule.

tasks.title: Triggers
tasks.subtitle: Task for logging triggers.
tasks.detail: This is an example task that allows the user to log events that they wish to track as triggers for their health condition.

tasks.title: Symptoms
tasks.subtitle: Task for logging symptoms.
tasks.detail: This is an example task that allows the user to log events that they wish to track as symptoms of a given health condition that they are experiencing.
